title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 218 - Emission Standards For Motor Vehicles And Motor Vehicle Engines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 218 - Emission Standards For Motor Vehicles And Motor Vehicle Engines

State Regulations

Subpart 218-1 - Applicability and Definitions (§ 218-1.1 to 218-1.2)

Subpart 218-2 - Certification and Prohibitions (§ 218-2.1 to 218-2.4)

Subpart 218-3 - Fleet Average (§ 218-3.1 to 218-3.4 to 218-3.6)

Subpart 218-4 - Zero Emission Vehicle Sales Mandate (§ 218-4.1 to 218-4.8)

Subpart 218-5 - Testing (§ 218-5.1 to 218-5.8)

Subpart 218-6 - Surveillance (§ 218-6.1 to 218-6.2)

Subpart 218-7 - AFTERMARKET PARTS (§ 218-7.1 to 218-7.15 to 218-7.17)

Subpart 218-8 - Greenhouse Gas Exhaust Emission Standards (§ 218-8.1 to 218-8.6 to 218-8.10)

Subpart 218-9 - Severability (§ 218-9.1 to 218-9.2)

Subpart 218-10 - Recall Requirements (§ 218-10.1 to 218-10.2)

Subpart 218-11 - Environmental Performance Labels (§ 218-11.1 to 218-11.2)

Subpart 218-12 - SEVERABILITY (§ 218-12.1)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 218

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-1101, 19-1103, 19-1105, 71-2103, 71-2105; Federal Clean Air Act, §
177

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
